detections.label: <<FORMULA_0238>>
detections.formula:
\begin{split}\label{eq:OG3}
        \mathbb{E}_{\pi_{0,1}}[\gL^\theta - \gL^\star]
        &= \int_0^1 \int_{\sR^d}  (\frac{1}{2}|| a_t^\theta - \lambda\nabla G_t||^2 + \frac{1}{2}\|u_{t|0,1}^\star\|^2 -   \langle  a_t^\theta, u_{t|0,1}^\star \rangle) p_t dxdt \\
        &= \int_0^1 \int_{\sR^d}  (\frac{1}{2}|| a_t^\theta - \lambda\nabla G_t||^2 + \frac{1}{2}\|u_{t|0,1}^\star\|^2 + \lambda {u_{t|0,1}^\star}^\intercal\nabla G_t -   \langle  a_t^\theta, u_{t|0,1}^\star \rangle) p_t dxdt \\
        &= \int_0^1 \int_{\sR^d} (\frac{1}{2}|| a_t^\theta - \nabla G_t||^2 + \frac{1}{2}\|u_{t|0,1}^\star\|^2 -  \langle u_{t|0,1}^\star,  a_t^\theta + \lambda \nabla G_t \rangle) p_t dxdt \\
        &= \int_0^1 \int_{\sR^d} (\frac{2}{1}\| a_t^\theta - \lambda \nabla G_t - u_{t|0,1}^\star|^2) p_t dxdt
    \end{split}
detections.error_description: The final line shows 2/1 * || a_t^θ - λ∇G_t - u_{t|0,1}^* ||^2 whereas earlier it was 1/2 * || a_t^θ - ∇G_t - u_{t|0,1}^* ||^2, effectively inverting the coefficient (1/2 → 2).

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0226>>
detections.error_description: An incorrect algebraic manipulation in the OG3 step attempts to complete the square and equate expressions that are not equal (e.g., converting 1/2||a - λ∇G||^2 + 1/2||u*||^2 - ⟨a, u*⟩ into a form involving ||a - ∇G||^2 and then to 2||a - λ∇G - u*||^2). This misuses parentheses/completion of the square.

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0231>>
detections.error_description: In the OG3 block, the cross-term sign is inconsistent: the second line adds + λ u^T ∇G, but the following line rewrites the expression as -⟨u, a + λ ∇G⟩, which would yield -λ ∇G·u instead of +λ ∇G·u, indicating a sign flip error in the mixed term.

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0234>>
detections.error_description: In the final line of the OG3 expression, the squared-term coefficient is 2 (2/1) before || a_t^θ - λ ∇G_t - u^* ||^2; completing the square should give 1/2 || a_t^θ - ∇G_t - u^* ||^2 (i.e., the coefficient is incorrect).
